    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    cGalaxy
    Represents a galaxy containing stars in the StarViewer application.
    cGalaxy.eGalaxyType
    Enumeration of galaxy types based on the Hubble classification system.
    cLoggingBase
    Abstract base class for all logging implementations in the system.
    cLoggingBase.eLogLevel
    Enumeration of available logging levels.
    cLoggingConsole
    A console logging decorator that outputs log messages to the console.
    cLoggingDecorator
    A decorator implementation for logging that wraps another logger.
    cLoggingFile
    A file logging decorator that writes log messages to a file.
    cLoggingStandby
    A standby logger implementation that outputs log messages to the console.
    cObjectBase
    Base class for all named objects in the system.
    cPlanet
    Represents a planet with potential moons in the StarViewer application.
    cPlanet.ePlanetType
    Enumeration of planetary types based on composition and structure.
    cProgram
    The main program class for StarViewer.
    cStar
    Represents a star system containing planets in the StarViewer application.
    cStar.eStarType
    Enumeration of stellar classification types based on the Morgan-Keenan system.
    cUniverse
    Represents a universe containing galaxies in the StarViewer application.
